Authenticates a user via UDT. Requires a valid delegation token.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"X-Modio-Delegation-Token","in":"header","description":"Delegation token for authentication","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
